results.title: Flimflam man
results.brief_description: A catchy animated tale about a flimflam man who turns out to be the man behind the hottest sportswear product ever. Non-narrated with a groovy soundtrack. Music by Markus Kellow.

results.title: Flight: an anthology
results.brief_description: An anthology of verse, prose, music and film about flying. In an age of technicalities and super-sonic developments, the film recaptures the basic freedom of getting above the clouds.

results.title: Flight: a new awareness
results.brief_description: As young people fly with hang gliders and a pilot soars upwards in a glider plane, the pilot reflects on how despite the earth’s many wonders - humans have always envied the birds and longed to fly. Soaring higher and higher, the pilot experiences an exhilarating freedom and a whole new perspective of the earth below. The earth becomes a single, living organism - more beautiful than he ever imagined. He discovers how fragile a hold life has on this planet and dreams of a technology that refines and perfects, rather than destroys and pollutes.

results.title: Flight to the planets
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Space Science”.
Examines both the principles that govern flight to the planets and the gravitational pull of each of the nine planets of our solar system.

results.title: Flight to Flinders
results.creator_credit: Ray Barnes, Tasmanian State Film Unit and Peter Young
results.brief_description: A brief tour of Flinders Island, Bass strait, showing its natural features, birds, and points of interest to visitors. Includes a good historical commentary, with some emphasis on the work done by early artists painting flora and fauna.

results.title: Flight plan
results.creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Stanley Hawes
results.brief_description: The organisation of ciial aviation in Australia; the planning and control behind, and during, every flight; the training of pilots and maintenance staff; plans for the future development of the service. Also features the Royal Flying Doctor Service.

results.title: Flight of the rhino
results.creator_credit: Sky Visuals, Tina Dalton and Gary Steer
results.brief_description: No other large wild animal is being wiped out at the rate of Africa’s black rhino. If this rate of slaughter continues the black rhino may not survive this decade. This video shows the extraordinary efforts that are being made in an attempt to save this animal from extinction. in a bid to svave them, rhinos are being dehorned, poachers are being shot on sight and rhinos are being transported to safe areas within Zimbabwe and to captive breeding centres overseas. Following the journey of nine black rhinos taken from the wilds of Zimbabwe and flown to Western Plains Zoo in outback Australia. It is hoped that the offspring of this herd will one day be returned to their home in Zimbabwe.

results.title: Flight of the navigator
results.creator_credit: PSO, Viking Film, New Star Entertainment, Robby Wald, Dimitri Villard and Randal Kleiser
results.brief_description: A 12 year old boy is mysteriously abducted by an alien ship and returns to earth eight years later, still only 12. He now possesses great navigational powers that enable him to fly his spaceship anywhere he desires. Along with the robotic commander Max and mascot Puckmarin, David encounters an adventure of extraterrestrial proportions. Based on the story by Mark H. Baxter. Cast includes Joey Cramer, Sarah Jessica Parker, Veronica Cartwright, Cliff de Young, Matt Adler, Howard Hesseman.

results.title: Flight of the innocent = La Corsa dell' innocente
results.creator_credit: Cristaldifilm, Fandango, Franco Castaldi, Domenico Procacci and Carlo Carlei
results.brief_description: This breathtakingly visual film, the first feature by Carlo Carei, captures the emotions and arouses the senses. Since 1966, due to the depressed economy in southern Italy, kidnapping has become almost an alternative industry. Men, women and children, from the wealthy north are kidnapped and used as bartering chips by their merciless captors. Feuds develop between rival gangs. Many survive…others are not so fortunate. The story centres upon Vito, a young Italian child whose family are in the kidnapping business and are brutally murdered by a rival gang. He escapes on a perilous journey with the murderers in hot pursuit. Although “Flight of the innocent” is fictional, similar events to those depicted continue to occur. Italian dialogue. English subtitles.

results.title: Flight of the doves
results.brief_description: Constantly bullied by their cruel stepfather, Finn Dove and his young sister Derval decide to run away and find their grandmother in Ireland. They are chased by their wicked Uncle Hawk, a master of disguise, who is aware that the children are heirs to a fortune. Features Ron Moody, Jack Wild and Helen Rayne. Based on the book by Walter Macken.
